tossup_question: -   –  The average value of a continuous function f(x) on a closed interval from 2 to 6 is 8. What is the value of the definite integral from 2 to 6 of f(x) dx?
bonus_question: -  12)  –  f(x) is a twice differentiable function where f prime of x is less than 0 and f double prime of x is less than 0 for all real numbers. If f(4) = 12 and f(5) = 9, what is the largest possible integer value for f(6)?
